cab.content: Hi;087Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, Wlk July 1910.(Received 12th.)93(59. 11th July. Malleson's M.D. 018 (? 29), 8th July. Herat, News via Karez reports arrival about 1st July of a Bolshevik Mission at Herat, Mission was accompanied by 400 Jiolshevik cavalry and 120 pony loads of arms and ammunition. Only 30 cavalry went through to Herat, remainder returning' to tho frontier. Party also includes one German officer and "have about 10 Austrians said to be expert in the manufacture of field equipment.2. There is much talk in Herat of sending large bodies of Ghazis thence to Chakansur, but nothing decided yet.
